name: Ship Taker
description:
-=Disclaimer=-

Unfortunately I was unable to get this game to work properly in the time provided. As a result it is barely playable in its current state and you will probably run into some bugs while playing.

--------------------------

Movement is controlled with WASD keys and shooting is done with space.

E causes you to eject from your current ship allowing you to take over another by ramming into it.

The longer you remain in control of a single ship the less control you will have over its subsystems.
